original: @215a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @215a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: nee ra a'a tam s'a dha nam n'a ma /
analyzed: nee ra a'a tam s'a dha nam n'a ma /
translated: Naïrātmyasādhananāma

original: bod skad du //
analyzed: bod skad du //
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bdag med ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: bdag med ma zhes bya ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
translated: The Means of Attaining Nairātmya

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Lady Nairātmya.

original: 'khor ba bud med gdul @215b gzigs nas //
analyzed: 'khor ba bud med gdul @215b gzigs nas //
translated: Seeing that the women of saṃsāra are to be tamed,

original: bdag med rnal 'byor mar bsgyur gang //
analyzed: bdag med rnal 'byor mar bsgyur gang //
translated: the Sage transformed into Nairātmyāyoginī.

original: thub pas pha rol phyin phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: thub pas pha rol phyin phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to the perfection of the Sage,

original: sgyu ma'i phyag rgya phyag 'tshal 'dud //
analyzed: sgyu ma'i phyag rgya phyag 'tshal 'dud //
translated: I bow down to the illusory mudrā.

original: rnal 'byor dang po slob dus na //
analyzed: rnal 'byor dang po slob dus na //
translated: In the time of training in the first yoga,

original: nges pa'i gnas bzang brtag byas te //
analyzed: nges pa'i gnas bzang brtag byas te //
translated: one should examine a good, definite place

original: gar gnas sngas pas sgrub ba yi //
analyzed: gar gnas sngas pas sgrub ba yi //
translated: and practice wherever one stays.

original: sems ni gcig bu mnyam gzhag pa'i //
analyzed: sems ni gcig bu mnyam gzhag pa'i //
translated: The mind is single-pointedly placed in equipoise.

original: ri dang tshad tshing bya skyibs ni //
analyzed: ri dang tshad tshing bya skyibs ni //
translated: In a mountain, a thicket, a bird's nest,

original: me tog 'bras bu sogs brgyan pa'i //
analyzed: me tog 'bras bu sogs brgyan pa'i //
translated: adorned with flowers, fruits, and so forth,

original: rdo rje skyil krung bcas byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje skyil krung bcas byas la //
translated: one should sit in the vajra posture.

original: snying gar pam las padma ste //
analyzed: snying gar pam las padma ste //
translated: At the heart, from paṃ, a lotus,

original: de steng ram las nyi dkyil 'khor //
analyzed: de steng ram las nyi dkyil 'khor //
translated: and upon that, from raṃ, a sun maṇḍala.

original: der ni gsal bar aa bsams te //
analyzed: der ni gsal bar aa bsams te //
translated: There, one should visualize a clear a.

original: de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas //
analyzed: de las 'od zer rab 'phros pas //
translated: From that, light radiates out

original: rdo rje las byung thugs rje che //
analyzed: rdo rje las byung thugs rje che //
translated: The great compassionate one arisen from the vajra,

original: nam mkhar rje btsun dmigs byas la //🔽rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi //
analyzed: nam mkhar rje btsun dmigs byas la // rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi //
translated: Visualizing the venerable one in the sky,🔽One should worship with the eight goddesses

original: lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya //
analyzed: lha mo brgyad kyis mchod par bya //
translated: Who hold all the ornaments.

original: goo r'i ri bong can 'dzin cing //🔽chom rkun ma ni nyi ma'i snod //
analyzed: goo r'i ri bong can 'dzin cing // chom rkun ma ni nyi ma'i snod //
translated: Gaurī holds the moon,🔽Caṇḍālī the sun,

original: ro langs ma ni lag na chu //
analyzed: ro langs ma ni lag na chu //
translated: Vetālī the water in her hand,

original: za phod ma ni sman 'dzin cing //
analyzed: za phod ma ni sman 'dzin cing //
translated: Ghasmarī holds medicine,

original: pukka s'i lag rdo rje ste //
analyzed: pukka s'i lag rdo rje ste //
translated: Pukkāsī the vajra in her hand,

original: de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin //
analyzed: de bzhin ri khrod ma ro 'dzin //
translated: And likewise, Śavarī holds a corpse.

original: gtum mo cang te'u brdung byas te //
analyzed: gtum mo cang te'u brdung byas te //
translated: Caṇḍālī beats a small drum,

original: 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod //
analyzed: 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod //
translated: And these worship the principal one.

original: 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas //
translated: Through passion for great passion,

original: g-yung mos phrag nas 'khyud pa nyid //
analyzed: g-yung mos phrag nas 'khyud pa nyid //
translated: Jñānī is embraced around the neck.

original: bla mas sangs rgyas rab tu mchod //
analyzed: bla mas sangs rgyas rab tu mchod //
translated: The guru worships the Buddha,

original: bla ma rdo rje mchod nas ni //
analyzed: bla ma rdo rje mchod nas ni //
translated: Having worshipped the guru vajra,

original: bdun po yongs su dag pa bya //
analyzed: bdun po yongs su dag pa bya //
translated: One should purify the seven.🔽One confesses the misdeeds done,🔽And one should restrain from doing them again,

original: sdig pa byas pa bshags pa dang // byed pa yang ni sdom pa dang // bsod nams dag la rjes yi rang //
analyzed: sdig pa byas pa bshags pa dang // byed pa yang ni sdom pa dang // bsod nams dag la rjes yi rang //
translated: Rejoicing in the merits,

original: de nas yongs su bsngo bar gyis //
analyzed: de nas yongs su bsngo bar gyis //
translated: Then one should dedicate them.

original: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
analyzed: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro //
translated: Take refuge in the Three Jewels.🔽Arouse the mind of supreme awakening,

original: byang chub mchog sems bskyed pa dang // lam la gnas shing bdag kyang ni //
analyzed: byang chub mchog sems bskyed pa dang // lam la gnas shing bdag kyang ni //
translated: and abide in the path, and also

original: gzhan gyi don du 'bul ba dang // gnang nod yang ni tshangs pa yi //
analyzed: gzhan gyi don du 'bul ba dang // gnang nod yang ni tshangs pa yi //
translated: offer oneself for the sake of others.

original: gnas bzhis sems ni dbugs phyung ste //
analyzed: gnas bzhis sems ni dbugs phyung ste //
translated: With the four abodes of Brahmā,

original: dang po byams pa bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dang po byams pa bsgom par bya //
translated: one should first cultivate loving kindness.

original: gnyis pa snying rje'i bye brag bsgom //
analyzed: gnyis pa snying rje'i bye brag bsgom //
translated: Second, one should cultivate the distinctions of compassion.

original: gsum pa dga' ba bsgom par bya //
analyzed: gsum pa dga' ba bsgom par bya //
translated: Third, one should cultivate joy.

original: thams cad tha ma btang snyoms so //
analyzed: thams cad tha ma btang snyoms so //
translated: All end with equanimity.

original: phyis ni byang chub sems brtan bya //
analyzed: phyis ni byang chub sems brtan bya //
translated: Afterwards, one should stabilize the mind of awakening.

original: de nas bsrung pa'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nas bsrung pa'i dam tshig go //
translated: Then, there is the commitment of protection.

original: dad po bden brdzun rnam dpyad nas //🔽rtog pa bya na bsgom mi nus //
analyzed: dad po bden brdzun rnam dpyad nas // rtog pa bya na bsgom mi nus //
translated: Having analyzed faith and truth,🔽if one engages in imagination, one cannot meditate.

original: bskyed pa med par rab sbyor bas //
analyzed: bskyed pa med par rab sbyor bas //
translated: Without generation, one should apply

original: bskyed pa 'di ni rab bshad do //
analyzed: bskyed pa 'di ni rab bshad do //
translated: this generation is well explained.

original: aom sh'u nya t'a dznya'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tam ko& ham //
analyzed: aom sh'u nya t'a dznya'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'a tam ko& ham //
translated: Oṃ śūnyatā-jñāna-vajra-svabhāvātmako ’haṃ

original: stong par rab bskyed h'um sngon las //
analyzed: stong par rab bskyed h'um sngon las //
translated: From the preliminary hūṃ, one should generate emptiness.

original: sna tshogs rdo rje'i bsam gtan bya //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje'i bsam gtan bya //
translated: One should meditate on the vajra cross.🔽One should radiate the syllable hūṃ,

original: @216a * // 'gro ba'i bdud rnams sel byed pa //🔽h'um las gsal bar spro bar bya //
analyzed: @216a * // 'gro ba'i bdud rnams sel byed pa // h'um las gsal bar spro bar bya //
translated: which removes the māras of beings.

original: aom raksha raksha h'um h'um zhes brjod do //🔽'di las rdo rjes bskor ba'i gur //
analyzed: aom raksha raksha h'um h'um zhes brjod do // 'di las rdo rjes bskor ba'i gur //
translated: One should recite “oṃ rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ.”🔽From this, one should meditate on a canopy

original: bla re yang ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: bla re yang ni bsgom par bya //
translated: encircled by vajras.

original: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam //🔽de yi dbus su bsgom pa ni //
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams su bha ga bsam // de yi dbus su bsgom pa ni //
translated: One should visualize the bhaga in the realm of space,🔽and in its center

original: yam byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor te //
analyzed: yam byung rlung gi dkyil 'khor te //
translated: one should meditate on the wind maṇḍala arisen from yaṃ,

original: sngon po gzhu bdungs ba dan mtshan //
analyzed: sngon po gzhu bdungs ba dan mtshan //
translated: blue, with a bow and arrow, and marked with a banner.

original: ram byung me yi dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: ram byung me yi dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: The fire maṇḍala arisen from raṃ

original: rdo rje'i phreng bskor gru gsum dmar //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phreng bskor gru gsum dmar //
translated: is red, triangular, and encircled by a vajra garland.

original: bam las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum //
analyzed: bam las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor zlum //
translated: The maṇḍala arisen from vaṃ is round,

original: dkar po bum pas bskor ba mtshan //
analyzed: dkar po bum pas bskor ba mtshan //
translated: white, and marked with a vase.

original: lam byung dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ste //
analyzed: lam byung dkyil 'khor gru bzhi ste //
translated: The maṇḍala arisen from laṃ is square,

original: ser po rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor //
analyzed: ser po rdo rje'i phreng bas bskor //
translated: yellow, and encircled by a vajra garland.

original: bhr'um las 'khor lo'i steng du bdag / srid pa bar ma bsam byas nas //
analyzed: bhr'um las 'khor lo'i steng du bdag / srid pa bar ma bsam byas nas //
translated: Having visualized oneself as the intermediate existence,

original: ae wam nyid du rab tu 'dres //
analyzed: ae wam nyid du rab tu 'dres //
translated: one should be well mixed with e vaṃ.

original: 'dres gyur de las byung ba ni //
analyzed: 'dres gyur de las byung ba ni //
translated: The one that arises from the union

original: sangs rgyas pho brang thun mong yin //
analyzed: sangs rgyas pho brang thun mong yin //
translated: is the common palace of the buddhas.🔽It is four-sided, with four doors,

original: ngos bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhi yis brgyan byas te //
analyzed: ngos bzhi pa dang sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhi yis brgyan byas te //
translated: and is adorned with four porticos.

original: dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan //
analyzed: dra ba dra phyed yang dag ldan //
translated: It is endowed with a network and half-network,

original: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
analyzed: ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes //
translated: and is beautified by eight pillars.

original: chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo ni //
analyzed: chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo ni //
translated: The wheel that arises from the source of phenomena

original: kha sbyor gnyis dang skyon med par //
analyzed: kha sbyor gnyis dang skyon med par //
translated: is the two conjoined, without fault.

original: ze 'bru la ni gcig nyid de //
analyzed: ze 'bru la ni gcig nyid de //
translated: On the pistil cup is the one,

original: gru gsum las ni gzhan du brjod //
analyzed: gru gsum las ni gzhan du brjod //
translated: which is said to be different from the triangle.

original: de yi dbus su ro bsams la //
analyzed: de yi dbus su ro bsams la //
translated: In the center of that, one should visualize the corpse,

original: bco lnga'i gdan ni bdag nyid do //🔽de yi steng du zla ba yin //
analyzed: bco lnga'i gdan ni bdag nyid do // de yi steng du zla ba yin //
translated: the seat of the fifteen, which is oneself.🔽Above that is the moon,

original: zla ba'i steng du sa bon te //
analyzed: zla ba'i steng du sa bon te //
translated: and above the moon is the seed syllable,

original: phyis ni nyi mas mnan pas so //
analyzed: phyis ni nyi mas mnan pas so //
translated: which is later pressed down by the sun.

original: gnyis su 'dus pa'i bde chen po //
analyzed: gnyis su 'dus pa'i bde chen po //
translated: The great bliss of the union of the two

original: a'a li zla ba'i gzugs su gnas //
analyzed: a'a li zla ba'i gzugs su gnas //
translated: is the āli, which abides in the form of the moon.

original: k'a li nyi ma'i gzugs gnas te //
analyzed: k'a li nyi ma'i gzugs gnas te //
translated: The kāli abides in the form of the sun.

original: zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus las //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma gnyis 'dus las //
translated: From the union of the moon and the sun,

original: goo r'i la sogs sa bon ni //
analyzed: goo r'i la sogs sa bon ni //
translated: the seed syllables of Gaurī, and so on,

original: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam /
analyzed: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam /
translated: A, ā, i, ī, u, ū, ṛ, ṝ, ḷ, ḹ, e, ai, o, au, am.

original: a'a li dang po bdag med ma //
analyzed: a'a li dang po bdag med ma //
translated: The first ālikāli is Nairātmyā.

original: a'a li gnyis pa rdo rje ste //
analyzed: a'a li gnyis pa rdo rje ste //
translated: The second ālikāli is Vajra.

original: a'a li gsum pa goo r'i ste //
analyzed: a'a li gsum pa goo r'i ste //
translated: The third ālikāli is Gaurī.

original: bzhi pa chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: bzhi pa chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The fourth is Vāriyoginī.

original: lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: The fifth is Vajraḍāka.

original: drug pa pukka s'i zhes brjod //
analyzed: drug pa pukka s'i zhes brjod //
translated: The sixth is called Pukkasī.

original: ri khrod ma ni bdun pa ste //
analyzed: ri khrod ma ni bdun pa ste //
translated: The seventh is Caṇḍālī.

original: gtum mo brgyad par shes par bya //
analyzed: gtum mo brgyad par shes par bya //
translated: The eighth is to be known as Caṇḍī.

original: dgu pa dang ni g-yung mo nyid //
analyzed: dgu pa dang ni g-yung mo nyid //
translated: The ninth is Ḍombinī.

original: yang ni goo r'i lnga gnyis pa //
analyzed: yang ni goo r'i lnga gnyis pa //
translated: Again, the two sets of five are Gaurī.

original: chom rkun ma ni bcu gcig ste //
analyzed: chom rkun ma ni bcu gcig ste //
translated: The eleventh is Caurī.

original: bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes bya //
analyzed: bcu gnyis ro langs ma zhes bya //
translated: The twelfth is called Vetālī.

original: bcu gsum pa ni za phod ma //
analyzed: bcu gsum pa ni za phod ma //
translated: The thirteenth is Ghasmarī.

original: bcu bzhi sa spyod ma zhes bya //
analyzed: bcu bzhi sa spyod ma zhes bya //
translated: The fourteenth is Pukkasi.

original: bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma //
analyzed: bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma //
translated: The fifteenth is Śavarī.

original: rnal 'byor ma rnams sa bon no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma rnams sa bon no //
translated: These are the seed syllables of the yoginīs.

original: zla ba me long ye shes ldan //
analyzed: zla ba me long ye shes ldan //
translated: The moon is endowed with mirror-like wisdom.

original: mnyam nyid ldan pa rta bdun pa //
analyzed: mnyam nyid ldan pa rta bdun pa //
translated: The seven horses are endowed with the wisdom of equality.

original: rang lha'i sa bon phyag @216b mtshan ni //
analyzed: rang lha'i sa bon phyag @216b mtshan ni //
translated: The seed syllables and hand implements of one’s deity

original: so sor rtog pa yin zhes brjod //
analyzed: so sor rtog pa yin zhes brjod //
translated: are said to be discerning wisdom.

original: thams cad gcig gyur nan tan te //
analyzed: thams cad gcig gyur nan tan te //
translated: All is unified, and so is earnest.

original: rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste //
analyzed: rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste //
translated: The perfection is the pure realm of reality.

original: 'di dag thams cad rdzogs pa ni //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad rdzogs pa ni //
translated: All of these perfections

original: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te //
analyzed: shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin te //
translated: Are the nature of wisdom and means.

original: zla ba nyi ma rab phye bas //
analyzed: zla ba nyi ma rab phye bas //
translated: The moon and sun are fully opened.

original: a'a li shes rab k'a li thabs //
analyzed: a'a li shes rab k'a li thabs //
translated: ĀLI is wisdom, KĀLI is means.

original: goo r'i la sogs 'di las byung //
analyzed: goo r'i la sogs 'di las byung //
translated: Gaurī and so forth arise from this.

original: dang po nang gi kha sbyar ba //
analyzed: dang po nang gi kha sbyar ba //
translated: First is the inner union,

original: nges par rnal 'byor ma lnga gnas //
analyzed: nges par rnal 'byor ma lnga gnas //
translated: Which definitely abides as the five yoginīs.

original: dbang po rdo rje gshin goo r'i //
analyzed: dbang po rdo rje gshin goo r'i //
translated: Indra is Vajraghaṇṭā,

original: chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
translated: Varuṇa is Varuṇīyoginī,

original: lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //🔽dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma // dbus su bdag med rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: Kubera is Vajraḍākinī,🔽And in the center is Nairātmyāyoginī.

original: phyi rol gyi ni kha sbyor la //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi ni kha sbyor la //
translated: In the outer union,

original: dbang ldan du ni pukka s'i //
analyzed: dbang ldan du ni pukka s'i //
translated: In the northeast is Pukkasī,

original: byin za'i grvar ni ri khrod ma //🔽bden bral du ni gtum mo ste //
analyzed: byin za'i grvar ni ri khrod ma // bden bral du ni gtum mo ste //
translated: In the southeast is Śavarī,🔽In the southwest is Caṇḍālī,

original: rlung gi mtshams su g-yung mo nyid //
analyzed: rlung gi mtshams su g-yung mo nyid //
translated: And in the northwest is Ḍombinī.

original: 'di dag mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: 'di dag mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma //
translated: These are the yoginīs of the intermediate directions.

original: shar gyi phyogs su goo r'i ste //
analyzed: shar gyi phyogs su goo r'i ste //
translated: In the east is Gaurī,

original: lho dang nub dang byang du ni //
analyzed: lho dang nub dang byang du ni //
translated: In the south, west, and north are

original: chom rkun ro langs za phod ma'o //
analyzed: chom rkun ro langs za phod ma'o //
translated: The thieves, the zombies, and the eaters of raw flesh.🔽

original: 'di dag phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma'o //
analyzed: 'di dag phyogs kyi rnal 'byor ma'o //
translated: The female yoginīs of the directions are the thieves, the zombies, and the devourers.

original: steng zhal ma dang 'og zhal ma //
analyzed: steng zhal ma dang 'og zhal ma //
translated: The upper face and the lower face

original: lha mo sa spyod mkha' spyod ma'o //
analyzed: lha mo sa spyod mkha' spyod ma'o //
translated: are the goddesses of the earth and the sky.

original: kha dog nag mo drag chen mo //
analyzed: kha dog nag mo drag chen mo //
translated: The black one is the great fierce one.

original: 'khor lo bdag po bdag med ma //
analyzed: 'khor lo bdag po bdag med ma //
translated: The lord of the wheel is Nairātmyā.

original: zhal gcig ma la spyan gsum dmar //
analyzed: zhal gcig ma la spyan gsum dmar //
translated: She has one face, three eyes, and red hair.

original: phyag gnyis skra ser gyen du 'greng //
analyzed: phyag gnyis skra ser gyen du 'greng //
translated: She has two arms, and her yellow hair stands upward.🔽She holds a skull cup and khaṭvāṅga in her left hand,

original: g-yon pa thod pa kha tv'am ga / g-yas pa'i phyag gis gri gug 'dzin //
analyzed: g-yon pa thod pa kha tv'am ga / g-yas pa'i phyag gis gri gug 'dzin //
translated: and a flaying knife in her right hand.🔽She wears a wheel, earrings, necklace,

original: 'khor lo rna cha mgur chu dang // lag gdub dang ni ska rags 'dzin //
analyzed: 'khor lo rna cha mgur chu dang // lag gdub dang ni ska rags 'dzin //
translated: armlets, and a belt.🔽She sits in half-lotus posture,

original: skyil krung phyed pas ro mnan nas //
analyzed: skyil krung phyed pas ro mnan nas //
translated: pressing on a corpse,

original: stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing //🔽bdag med rnal 'byor ji bzhin du //
analyzed: stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing // bdag med rnal 'byor ji bzhin du //
translated: and is wrapped in an elephant hide below.

original: 'di dag thams cad mtshungs par bshad //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad mtshungs par bshad //
translated: All of this is explained as being the same🔽as the Nairātmyāyoginī.

original: rang snying pad snying sa bon bsam //
analyzed: rang snying pad snying sa bon bsam //
translated: One should visualize the seed syllable in the heart of the lotus in one’s heart,

original: ye shes snying gar ye shes bsgom //
analyzed: ye shes snying gar ye shes bsgom //
translated: and visualize the wisdom being in one’s heart.

original: dgug par byas te yang dag mchod //
analyzed: dgug par byas te yang dag mchod //
translated: Having summoned her, one should make perfect offerings.

original: ye shes 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ye shes 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
translated: One should visualize the wisdom wheel.

original: mig la sogs par gti mug sogs //
analyzed: mig la sogs par gti mug sogs //
translated: Delusion, etc. , in the eyes, etc.

original: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod //
translated: The three vajras are placed in the three places.

original: gti mug rdo rje mig gnyis la //
analyzed: gti mug rdo rje mig gnyis la //
translated: Delusion Vajra in the two eyes,

original: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma //🔽sna la ser sna ma zhes brjod //🔽kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
analyzed: rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma // sna la ser sna ma zhes brjod // kha la 'dod chags rdo rje ma //
translated: Hatred Vajra in the ears,🔽Jealousy Vajra in the nose,

original: reg la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
analyzed: reg la phrag dog rdo rje ma //
translated: Passion Vajra in the mouth,🔽Avarice Vajra in the body,

original: yid la rnal 'byor bdag med ma //
analyzed: yid la rnal 'byor bdag med ma //
translated: and Yoginī Nairātmya in the mind.

original: sku gsung de bzhin thugs kyi ni //
analyzed: sku gsung de bzhin thugs kyi ni //
translated: The mantra of the body, speech, and mind,

original: aom dang a'a: h'um sngags 'di las //🔽mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ma //
analyzed: aom dang a'a: h'um sngags 'di las // mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ma //
translated: is OṂ, ĀḤ, and HŪṂ.🔽One should meditate on the celestial, terrestrial,

original: sa 'og gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya //
analyzed: sa 'og gnas pa'i bsam gtan bya //
translated: and subterranean goddesses.

original: sna tshogs gzugs su yang dag brjod //🔽'di ltar rnam par snang mdzad @217a * //
analyzed: sna tshogs gzugs su yang dag brjod // 'di ltar rnam par snang mdzad @217a * //
translated: One should visualize the various forms🔽of Vairocana, etc.

original: sogs // snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer ni //
analyzed: sogs // snying ga'i sa bon 'od zer ni //
translated: The seed syllables in the heart🔽are in the form of hooks, summoning the Sugatas.

original: lcags kyu'i rnam pas bde gshegs bkug / lha mo brgyad kyis mchod byas na //
analyzed: lcags kyu'i rnam pas bde gshegs bkug / lha mo brgyad kyis mchod byas na //
translated: Having been worshipped by the eight goddesses,

original: dbang bskur ba ni blang ba'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba ni blang ba'o //
translated: one should receive the consecration.

original: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
analyzed: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs pa kun //
translated: “Blessed One, all the Tathāgatas,

original: bdag la dbang bskur la sogs gsol //
analyzed: bdag la dbang bskur la sogs gsol //
translated: please grant me the consecration, etc. ”

original: de nas he ru ka yi gzugs //
analyzed: de nas he ru ka yi gzugs //
translated: Then the form of Heruka.

original: de nas bdag la dbang bskur bsam //
analyzed: de nas bdag la dbang bskur bsam //
translated: Then one should think of the consecration of oneself.🔽Mind, permanence, precious self,

original: sems dang rtag pa rin chen bdag / snang ba mtha' yas don grub rnams //🔽bdag med shar gyi rdo rje sogs //
analyzed: sems dang rtag pa rin chen bdag / snang ba mtha' yas don grub rnams // bdag med shar gyi rdo rje sogs //
translated: Amitābha, and Amoghasiddhi,

original: rnal 'byor ma lngas rgya yis gdab //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma lngas rgya yis gdab //
translated: the five yoginīs seal Nairātmya, Vajra of the east, and so forth.🔽Mind, permanence, precious self,

original: sems dang rtag pa rin chen bdag / snang mtha' mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: sems dang rtag pa rin chen bdag / snang mtha' mtshams kyi rnal 'byor ma //
translated: Amitābha, the yoginī of the south,

original: zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal che //
analyzed: zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal che //
translated: great hatred, ignorance, and pride,

original: 'dod chags rdo rje phyogs gnas ma //
analyzed: 'dod chags rdo rje phyogs gnas ma //
translated: desire, and Vajra, the one who abides in the direction.

original: rgyas gdab sku dang gsung nyid kyis //
analyzed: rgyas gdab sku dang gsung nyid kyis //
translated: The sealing is with the body and speech,

original: mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ma //
analyzed: mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod ma //
translated: the celestial and terrestrial yoginīs,

original: dang po nag po bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dang po nag po bsgom par bya //
translated: one should meditate on the first as black,

original: gnyis pa dmar po bsgom pa ste //
analyzed: gnyis pa dmar po bsgom pa ste //
translated: the second as red,

original: gsum pa ser po bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: gsum pa ser po bsgom pa'o //
translated: the third as yellow,

original: de bzhin bzhi pa ljang gu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin bzhi pa ljang gu'o //
translated: the fourth likewise as green,

original: lnga pa kha dog sngon po'o //
analyzed: lnga pa kha dog sngon po'o //
translated: the fifth as blue,

original: drug pa dkar por rnam par bsgom //
analyzed: drug pa dkar por rnam par bsgom //
translated: and the sixth as white.

original: rnal 'byor yan lag drug bsgom bya //
analyzed: rnal 'byor yan lag drug bsgom bya //
translated: One should meditate on the six-branched yoga.

original: lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis //
analyzed: lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis //
translated: By the blazing of caṇḍālī at the navel,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs te //
translated: The five Tathagatas are burned,

original: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pas //
analyzed: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs pas //
translated: and Locana and so forth are burned.

original: bsreg pas ham las ri bong 'dzag / bsam gtan gyis du ba rnal 'byor gang //
analyzed: bsreg pas ham las ri bong 'dzag / bsam gtan gyis du ba rnal 'byor gang //
translated: The yogi who remembers the smoke of the cremation ground

original: de ni dag pa rjes dran bya //
analyzed: de ni dag pa rjes dran bya //
translated: should remember the pure [aggregates].

original: gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te //
analyzed: gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te //
translated: The form aggregate is Vajra Woman,

original: tshor ba gsang ba goo r'i ste //
analyzed: tshor ba gsang ba goo r'i ste //
translated: and feeling is the secret Gauri.

original: de bzhin chu lha 'du shes ma //
analyzed: de bzhin chu lha 'du shes ma //
translated: Likewise, perception is Varuni,

original: 'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: 'du byed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: and volitions are Vajra Dakini.

original: rnam shes phung po gzugs su ni //
analyzed: rnam shes phung po gzugs su ni //
translated: The consciousness aggregate is in the form

original: bdag med rdo rje ma gnas so //
analyzed: bdag med rdo rje ma gnas so //
translated: of Nairatmya Vajra Woman.

original: sa khams pukka s'i ru brjod //🔽chu khams ri khrod ma ru brjod //
analyzed: sa khams pukka s'i ru brjod // chu khams ri khrod ma ru brjod //
translated: The earth element is said to be PukkasI,🔽and the water element is said to be Shavari.

original: drod ni gtum mo rab tu brjod //
analyzed: drod ni gtum mo rab tu brjod //
translated: Heat is said to be Ca.ndali,

original: rlung ni g-yung mor rab tu grags //
analyzed: rlung ni g-yung mor rab tu grags //
translated: and wind is renowned as Ghasmari.

original: gzugs la goo r'i rab tu grags //
analyzed: gzugs la goo r'i rab tu grags //
translated: Form is renowned as Gauri,

original: sgra la chom rkun rab tu grags //
analyzed: sgra la chom rkun rab tu grags //
translated: and sound is renowned as Cha.ndali.

original: dri yi cha la ro langs ma //
analyzed: dri yi cha la ro langs ma //
translated: The part of smell is Vetali,

original: ro la de bzhin za phod ma //🔽reg bya la ni sa spyod de //
analyzed: ro la de bzhin za phod ma // reg bya la ni sa spyod de //
translated: and taste is likewise Ghasmari.🔽Touch is Pukkasi,

original: chos kyi khams la mkha' spyod ma //
analyzed: chos kyi khams la mkha' spyod ma //
translated: and the element of mental objects is Shavari.

original: zhe sdang rdo rje mar bshad do //
analyzed: zhe sdang rdo rje mar bshad do //
translated: Is explained as Hatred Vajrī.

original: 'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: 'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma //
translated: Desire is the Yoginī of Water,

original: phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste //
analyzed: phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ste //
translated: Jealousy is Vajraḍāka,

original: ser sna gsang ba'i goo r'i ma //
analyzed: ser sna gsang ba'i goo r'i ma //
translated: Avarice is Guhyagaurī,

original: de bzhin gti mug rdo rje ste //
analyzed: de bzhin gti mug rdo rje ste //
translated: And likewise, Delusion is Vajra.

original: yid la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: yid la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: Mind is Vajraḍāka,

original: zhe sdang la sogs dag pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang la sogs dag pa'o //
translated: The purity of hatred and so forth.

original: skyes pa'i bdud ni mgo bo 'dzin //
analyzed: skyes pa'i bdud ni mgo bo 'dzin //
translated: The māra of birth is the head,

original: gri gug @217b lha ni gcod pa'o //
analyzed: gri gug @217b lha ni gcod pa'o //
translated: The god of the knife is the cutting,

original: thod pa nyon mongs mgo bo yi //
analyzed: thod pa nyon mongs mgo bo yi //
translated: The skull is the head of the afflictions,

original: phung po'i bdud ni ro brjod do //
analyzed: phung po'i bdud ni ro brjod do //
translated: The māra of the aggregates is the corpse.

original: mi bskyod pa ni 'khor lo'i gzugs //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa ni 'khor lo'i gzugs //
translated: Akṣobhya is the form of the wheel,🔽Amitābha is the lord of earrings,🔽The necklace is the lord of jewels,

original: snang ba mtha' yas rna cha'i bdag / mgur chu la ni rin chen bdag / lag gdub la ni rtag par brjod //
analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas rna cha'i bdag / mgur chu la ni rin chen bdag / lag gdub la ni rtag par brjod //
translated: The armlet is always declared.

original: ska rags la ni don yod gnas //
analyzed: ska rags la ni don yod gnas //
translated: The waistband is Amoghasiddhi.🔽The five symbolic ornaments are pure,

original: phyag rgya lnga ni rnam par dag / bsam gtan gyis dub gsang sngags bzlas //
analyzed: phyag rgya lnga ni rnam par dag / bsam gtan gyis dub gsang sngags bzlas //
translated: The mantra is recited when tired from meditation.

original: a'a li mtha' yi aa spangs pa //
analyzed: a'a li mtha' yi aa spangs pa //
translated: The end of āli is devoid of a,

original: aom yig h'um phat dang ldan pa'i //
analyzed: aom yig h'um phat dang ldan pa'i //
translated: Endowed with the syllable oṃ, hūṃ, and phaṭ,

original: sv'a h'a mthar gzhag gsang sngags so //
analyzed: sv'a h'a mthar gzhag gsang sngags so //
translated: The mantra is placed at the end with svāhā.

original: aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i ae aee ao aoo aam h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ a ā / i ī / u ū / ṛ ṝ / ḷ ḹ / e ai / o au / aṃ aḥ / haṃ phaṭ svāhā.🔽In order to accomplish all desired aims

original: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa dang // bgegs ni zad cing zhi ba'i phyir //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa dang // bgegs ni zad cing zhi ba'i phyir //
translated: and to pacify and exhaust obstacles,🔽one should offer a bali🔽with Acala,

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i cho ga yis //🔽mi g-yo bas ni gtor ma sbyin //🔽rlung me thod pa la gnas pa //
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i cho ga yis // mi g-yo bas ni gtor ma sbyin // rlung me thod pa la gnas pa //
translated: in accordance with the rite explained below.🔽One should accomplish the great meat and the five elixirs🔽by heating with the blazing fire

original: 'bar bas bsro ba la sogs pas //🔽sha chen bdud rtsi lnga bsgrub po //
analyzed: 'bar bas bsro ba la sogs pas // sha chen bdud rtsi lnga bsgrub po //
translated: that rests on the wind, fire, and skull.🔽One should consecrate

original: yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i //
analyzed: yi ge gsum gyis byin brlabs pa'i //
translated: with the three syllables.🔽Oṃ indra,

original: aom ainda / dza ma /🔽dza la / dzkkha /
analyzed: aom ainda / dza ma / dza la / dzkkha /
translated: yama,🔽varuṇa,

original: bh'u ta / bahni /
analyzed: bh'u ta / bahni /
translated: kubera,

original: ba au / rakkha /🔽tsanda / s'u dzdza /
analyzed: ba au / rakkha / tsanda / s'u dzdza /
translated: brahmā,🔽viṣṇu,

original: m'a da / pappa /
analyzed: m'a da / pappa /
translated: śiva,

original: ta la pa t'a l'a /
analyzed: ta la pa t'a l'a /
translated: and all the others,🔽svāhā!

original: aashtva / sappa sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aashtva / sappa sv'a h'a /
translated: Please enjoy

original: ai dam ba lim /🔽bhunydza / dzim gha /
analyzed: ai dam ba lim / bhunydza / dzim gha /
translated: this bali offering of🔽food, drink,

original: phull / dh'u ppa /🔽pushba / m'am sa /🔽ping gha / aamba /🔽sarbba / kadzda /🔽s'a dha / khanti /
analyzed: phull / dh'u ppa / pushba / m'am sa / ping gha / aamba / sarbba / kadzda / s'a dha / khanti /
translated: incense,

original: khu ni / phe da /
analyzed: khu ni / phe da /
translated: flowers,🔽perfume,🔽and music,🔽all of it!

original: ga da / aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /🔽a'a dya nu tpann tv'a ta /
analyzed: ga da / aom aa k'a ro mu kham sarba dharm'a n'am /🔽a'a dya nu tpann tv'a ta /
translated: Oṃ, all phenomena🔽have the nature of the unborn.

original: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ āḥ hūṃ phaṭ svāhā.

original: mkhas pa chen po dpal mi thub zla bas mdzad pa'i bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
analyzed: mkhas pa chen po dpal mi thub zla bas mdzad pa'i bdag med ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
translated: The sādhana of Nairātmya composed by the great scholar Śrī Ajitamitra is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dha ra dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong sh'akya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dha ra dang / lo ts'a ba dge slong sh'akya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
translated: The Indian preceptor Gayadhara and the translator-monk Śākya Yeshe translated this.
